page.title: 03Two Dartmoor Legends
page.content: Jay's Grave There is a grave in the middle of Dartmoor by the side of the road leading north from Hound Tor. The grave is said to be occupied by the body of a servant girl who used to work at a nearby farm.She committed suicide because she was betrayed by her lover, but the strange thing is that no matter what time of year, the grave has always got fresh flowers on it.Mysterious isn't it? Hairy Hands At a narrow bridge between Princetown and Postbridge many accidents have occurred and it is said that a pair of {'hairy hands'}appear taking control of the vehicle, forcing it off the road. One lady, in a caravan parked near the bridge, says she saw the hands appear at her window but quickly making the sign of the cross, they disappeared.
